title: Our Courses
subtitle: Training Courses
text: Each of our courses fulfills the goal of providing you with specific information of the highest level, which will give you the necessary knowledge so that you can perform in specific areas.
Developing knowledge and skills to save lives is the basis of our management.

OSHA-Institute safety training is trusted around the world. Armed with the latest research, OSHA-Institute experts begin by incorporating OSHA, ANSI and ASME compliance regulations into the courses we design.
But OSHA-Institute courses go far beyond these basics to include global best practices to prevent injuries and deaths in various industries.
Our optimal complement is the experience lived in the various industrial sectors that were complemented with scientific and engineering studies.
